headline.print_headline: Arkansas to Appeal Ruling on Abortion Restriction Law
headline.main: Arkansas to Appeal Ruling on Abortion Restriction Law

docs.snippet: Arkansas Attorney General Dustin McDaniel said on Friday he would appeal a federal judge's decision striking down a state law that bans most abortions starting at 12 weeks of pregnancy, one of the most stringent such statutes in the United States....
docs.lead_paragraph: Arkansas Attorney General Dustin McDaniel said on Friday he would appeal a federal judge's decision striking down a state law that bans most abortions starting at 12 weeks of pregnancy, one of the most stringent such statutes in the United States.

headline.print_headline: U.S. Says G7 Backs More Sanctions if Russia Escalates Ukraine Crisis
headline.main: U.S. Says G7 Backs More Sanctions if Russia Escalates Ukraine Crisis

docs.snippet: A group of the world's leading rich nations will support increasing sanctions against Russia if Moscow escalates the crisis in Ukraine, U.S. Treasury Secretary Jack Lew said on Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A group of the world's leading rich nations will support increasing sanctions against Russia if Moscow escalates the crisis in Ukraine, U.S. Treasury Secretary Jack Lew said on Friday.

headline.print_headline: Chinese Online Cosmetics Retailer Jumei Files for $400 Million U.S. IPO
headline.main: Chinese Online Cosmetics Retailer Jumei Files for $400 Million U.S. IPO

docs.snippet: Jumei International Holding Ltd, backed by venture-capital firm Sequoia Capital, filed with U.S. regulators on Friday to raise up to $400 million in an initial public offering of American Depositary Shares....
docs.lead_paragraph: Jumei International Holding Ltd, backed by venture-capital firm Sequoia Capital, filed with U.S. regulators on Friday to raise up to $400 million in an initial public offering of American Depositary Shares.

docs.snippet: In 2011, there were 117 tax returns that showed both total income of at least $5 million as well as unemployment insurance income....
docs.abstract: In 2011, there were 117 tax returns that showed both total income of at least $5 million as well as unemployment insurance income.

headline.print_headline: Faster Airport-Screening Program Expands to DFW
headline.main: Faster Airport-Screening Program Expands to DFW

docs.snippet: Travelers can now apply at Dallas-Fort Worth International Airport for clearance to keep their shoes, belts and light jackets on while passing through security screening....
docs.lead_paragraph: Travelers can now apply at Dallas-Fort Worth International Airport for clearance to keep their shoes, belts and light jackets on while passing through security screening.

headline.print_headline: Shawn Langdon Leads Top Fuel Qualifying
headline.main: Shawn Langdon Leads Top Fuel Qualifying

docs.snippet: Shawn Langdon led Top Fuel qualifying Friday in the NHRA Four-Wide Nationals with a run of 3.753 seconds at 321.81 mph....
docs.lead_paragraph: Shawn Langdon led Top Fuel qualifying Friday in the NHRA Four-Wide Nationals with a run of 3.753 seconds at 321.81 mph.

headline.print_headline: Murder Charge for Teen in Police Officer's Death
headline.main: Murder Charge for Teen in Police Officer's Death

docs.snippet: A 16-year-old boy accused of setting a mattress fire that led to the death of a veteran police officer was indicted on a murder charge on Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A 16-year-old boy accused of setting a mattress fire that led to the death of a veteran police officer was indicted on a murder charge on Friday.

headline.print_headline: Oil Up 3 Pct for the Week as Driving Season Nears
headline.main: Oil Up 3 Pct for the Week as Driving Season Nears

docs.snippet: The price of oil rose nearly 3 percent this week on expectations that U.S. drivers would hit the road and drive up demand for gasoline....
docs.lead_paragraph: The price of oil rose nearly 3 percent this week on expectations that U.S. drivers would hit the road and drive up demand for gasoline.

headline.sub: "What crime have innocent people committed?"- witness to attack in Iraq
headline.main: "What crime have innocent people committed?"- witness to attack in Iraq

docs.snippet: Two car bombs strike in Shi'ite neighborhoods in the Iraqi capital killing at least 13 people, leaving at least 55 others wounded. Deborah Lutterbeck reports....
docs.lead_paragraph: Two car bombs strike in Shi'ite neighborhoods in the Iraqi capital killing at least 13 people, leaving at least 55 others wounded. Deborah Lutterbeck reports.

headline.print_headline: Microsoft Sued Over Browser Miscue That Led to $731 Million EU Fine
headline.main: Microsoft Sued Over Browser Miscue That Led to $731 Million EU Fine

docs.snippet: Microsoft Corp's board faces a lawsuit over the way it handled an error with its Internet Explorer browser that ended up costing the company a record-breaking $731 million fine by European antitrust regulators....
docs.lead_paragraph: Microsoft Corp's board faces a lawsuit over the way it handled an error with its Internet Explorer browser that ended up costing the company a record-breaking $731 million fine by European antitrust regulators.
